description: Returns statistical information about your OpenSearch Serverless access policies, security configurations, and security policies.

nested_items.name: AccessPolicyStats
nested_items.description: Information about the data access policies in your account.

nested_items.name: DataPolicyCount
nested_items.description: The number of data access policies in the current account.

nested_items.name: SecurityPolicyStats
nested_items.description: Information about the security policies in your account.

nested_items.name: EncryptionPolicyCount
nested_items.description: The number of encryption policies in the current account.

nested_items.name: NetworkPolicyCount
nested_items.description: The number of network policies in the current account.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfigStats
nested_items.description: Information about the security configurations in your account.

nested_items.name: SamlConfigCount
nested_items.description: The number of security configurations in the current account.

nested_items.name: LifecyclePolicyStats
nested_items.description: Information about the lifecycle policies in your account.

nested_items.name: RetentionPolicyCount
nested_items.description: The number of retention lifecycle policies in the current account.

nested_items.name: TotalPolicyCount
nested_items.description: The total number of OpenSearch Serverless security policies and configurations in your account.
